items.sentence: I don't think you should do that by yourself.
I don't think I'll have to do that by myself.
I want you to tell Tom that I won't be there.
Are you allergic to any of these ingredients?
Tom had an out-of-body experience as a child.
I wasn't the one who taught Tom how to drive.
I never thought I'd run into Tom in the park.
I just hope Tom does what we asked him to do.
I don't know how Tom did that, but he did it.
I convinced Tom to lie about where he'd been.
How long does Tom expect us to wait for Mary?
Do you think you could persuade Tom to drive?
Do you think Tom would teach me how to drive?
Do you really think Tom will help us do that?
Did Tom say anything about who Mary was with?
Did Tom actually see Mary eating my sandwich?
Could what happened to Tom also happen to us?
Ask Tom if Mary will eat lunch with us today.
Tom will probably be chosen for the position.
Tom will be grilling fish for dinner tonight.
Tom was surprised to see Mary in the library.
Tom was confused and didn't know what to say.
Tom wanted to stay with us until next Monday.
Tom wanted to marry Mary and John's daughter.
Tom wanted to learn how to cook Chinese food.
Tom wanted to know why Mary did what she did.
Tom wanted to know what we're planning to do.
Tom wanted to know the cause of the accident.
The armed hijackers terrified the passengers.
Tom eats eggs for breakfast almost every day.
I used to always go for a walk before dinner.
I remember the Christmases when I was little.
Tom's behaviour at the party was inexcusable.
You look just like your father in this photo.
It warms my heart whenever I see Tom do that.
You've got to wait until there's a free seat.
You've got to wait until there's a seat free.
You've got to wait until a seat becomes free.
How many books did you read in the past year?
This store isn't exactly in a prime location.
I'm going to have to listen to that in a bit.
Tom put his spoon down and picked up his cup.
Tom picked his toys up and put them in a box.
Would you mind watching my kids for a minute?
Tom wanted to join the gang that John was in.
While you're driving, watch out for potholes.
We enjoyed ourselves at the party last night.
Don't you think that necklace is a bit gaudy?

Yanni doesn't even know how to use that tool.
